item.title: A CSS Word-break Bug
item.description: So on my last post, I encountered a strange bug on Chrome (but not on Firefox) where some of my text was breaking mid-word, without so much as a hyphen inserted. Here’s a screenshot: I’m using the Hexo framework for my blog, along with a theme from github called Apollo, so I started reading through the SASS files, but couldn’t isolate what exactly was causing this strange bug I’d never encountered before.
